products.name: Smartphone
products.description: Latest model smartphone with 128GB storage. Features a high-resolution display, powerful processor, and long-lasting battery life. Comes with advanced camera capabilities, including night mode and portrait mode for stunning photos. Supports 5G connectivity for faster internet speeds.

products.name: Laptop
products.description: Powerful laptop with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD. Ideal for professionals and gamers, this laptop offers a sleek design and a high-definition display. Equipped with the latest graphics card for smooth performance. Includes a backlit keyboard and multiple connectivity options.

products.name: Wireless
products.description: Noise-cancelling wireless earbuds with long battery life. Enjoy crystal-clear sound quality with these comfortable earbuds. Perfect for workouts, commuting, and daily use. Features touch controls and voice assistant compatibility.

products.name: Men's Jacket
products.description: Stylish and warm men's jacket, perfect for winter. Made from high-quality materials, this jacket provides excellent insulation and wind resistance. Features a detachable hood, multiple pockets, and a comfortable fit. Available in various sizes and colors.

products.name: Women's Dress
products.description: Elegant evening dress for special occasions. Crafted from premium fabric, this dress offers a flattering fit and exquisite detailing. Available in multiple colors and sizes, it is designed to make you stand out at any event. Easy to care for and maintain.

products.name: Fiction Novel
products.description: Bestselling fiction novel with gripping storyline. Dive into a world of mystery, adventure, and romance with this captivating book. Perfect for book clubs and personal reading. Written by an award-winning author.

products.name: Cookbook
products.description: Comprehensive cookbook with delicious recipes. Features step-by-step instructions and beautiful photographs for each dish. Ideal for both beginners and experienced cooks. Includes a variety of cuisines and dietary options.

products.name: Microwave Oven
products.description: High power microwave oven with multiple settings. This microwave offers quick and even heating with a variety of preset functions. Comes with a spacious interior and easy-to-clean design. Energy-efficient and reliable performance.

products.name: Blender
products.description: Multi-speed blender for smoothies and more. Create delicious drinks, soups, and sauces with ease. Features a powerful motor and durable blades. Easy to use and clean, with a sleek, compact design.

products.name: Action Figure
products.description: Collectible action figure from popular series. Highly detailed and articulated, this figure is perfect for fans and collectors. Comes with accessories and a display stand. Limited edition release.

products.name: Board Game
products.description: Fun board game for the whole family. Engaging and strategic gameplay with various modes. Suitable for ages 8 and up. Includes all necessary pieces and instructions for hours of entertainment.

products.name: Running Shoes
products.description: Comfortable and durable running shoes. Designed for optimal performance with breathable material and cushioned sole. Available in multiple sizes and colors. Ideal for both casual runners and athletes.

products.name: Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat for all fitness levels. Provides excellent support and cushioning for your yoga practice. Lightweight and portable, with a textured surface for better grip. Available in various colors.

products.name: Face Cream
products.description: Moisturizing face cream for all skin types. Enriched with natural ingredients, this cream hydrates and nourishes your skin. Suitable for daily use, leaving your skin soft and smooth. Dermatologist tested and approved.

products.name: Perfume
products.description: Long-lasting fragrance for everyday wear. This perfume offers a unique blend of floral and woody notes. Comes in an elegant bottle, perfect for gifting. A scent that lingers and captivates.

products.name: Car Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Portable vacuum cleaner for car interiors. Compact and powerful, this vacuum effectively cleans dust and debris. Features multiple attachments for different surfaces. Easy to use and store.

products.name: Car Seat Cover
products.description: Comfortable and durable car seat covers. Protects your car seats from wear and tear while adding a stylish touch. Easy to install and maintain. Available in various designs and colors.

products.name: Garden Hose
products.description: Flexible and durable garden hose. Ideal for watering plants and cleaning outdoor areas. Resistant to kinks and tangles, with a strong water flow. Comes in various lengths to suit your needs.

products.name: Lawn Mower
products.description: Electric lawn mower with adjustable settings. Easy to maneuver and operate, providing a clean cut every time. Features a large grass collection bag and safety mechanisms. Energy-efficient and low maintenance.

products.name: Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic office chair with lumbar support. Designed for maximum comfort during long hours of work. Adjustable height and reclining features. Made with breathable material and durable construction.

products.name: Tablet
products.description: Versatile tablet with a 10.5-inch high-resolution display. Perfect for streaming, reading, and browsing. Comes with a powerful processor and long battery life. Includes a stylus for note-taking and drawing.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: Stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking features. Monitors heart rate, steps, and sleep patterns. Compatible with both iOS and Android devices. Waterproof design and customizable watch faces.

products.name: Winter Coat
products.description: Warm and stylish winter coat for women. Made with high-quality insulation and a waterproof outer layer. Features a detachable faux fur hood and multiple pockets. Available in various sizes and colors.

products.name: Children's Book
products.description: Engaging children's book with colorful illustrations. Perfect for bedtime stories and early readers. Teaches valuable lessons and encourages imagination. Suitable for ages 3-7.

products.name: Espresso Machine
products.description: High-quality espresso machine for coffee enthusiasts. Features a built-in grinder and milk frother. Easy to use with multiple brew settings. Makes perfect espresso, cappuccino, and latte.

products.name: Puzzle Set
products.description: Challenging puzzle set for all ages. Includes 1000 pieces with a beautiful scenic image. Improves problem-solving skills and patience. Made from high-quality materials for durability.

products.name: Treadmill
products.description: High-performance treadmill for home workouts. Features adjustable speed and incline settings. Comes with a built-in heart rate monitor and pre-programmed workouts. Foldable design for easy storage.

products.name: Hair Dryer
products.description: Professional hair dryer with multiple heat settings. Provides fast drying with ionic technology for smooth, shiny hair. Includes a diffuser and concentrator nozzle. Lightweight and easy to handle.

products.name: Car Dash Cam
products.description: High-definition dash cam for your car. Captures clear video footage day and night. Features loop recording, motion detection, and parking mode. Easy to install and use.

products.name: Patio Furniture Set
products.description: Stylish and durable patio furniture set. Includes a table and four chairs with cushions. Made from weather-resistant materials. Perfect for outdoor dining and relaxation.

products.name: Gaming Console
products.description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K support. Experience immersive gaming with high-resolution graphics and fast loading times. Comes with a wireless controller and several built-in games.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Energy-saving smart thermostat with remote control. Adjust your home's temperature from anywhere using your smartphone. Features easy installation and compatibility with most HVAC systems.

products.name: Electric Toothbrush
products.description: Advanced electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes. Ensures thorough cleaning with a timer and pressure sensor. Comes with replaceable brush heads and a travel case.

products.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.description: High-quality noise-cancelling headphones for a premium audio experience. Features long battery life, comfortable ear pads, and Bluetooth connectivity. Ideal for travel and work.

products.name: Air Purifier
products.description: Efficient air purifier with HEPA filter. Removes allergens, dust, and pet dander for cleaner air. Features a quiet operation mode and multiple fan speeds. Suitable for large rooms.

products.name: 4K TV
products.description: Ultra HD 4K TV with stunning picture quality. Features smart TV capabilities, HDR support, and multiple HDMI ports. Perfect for movies, sports, and gaming.

products.name: Wireless Charger
products.description: Fast wireless charger for smartphones and accessories. Compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicators and overcharge protection.

products.name: Electric Kettle
products.description: Stainless steel electric kettle with rapid boiling. Features a 1.7-liter capacity, auto shut-off, and boil-dry protection. Easy to use and clean, perfect for tea and coffee.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.description: Wearable fitness tracker with heart rate monitor. Tracks steps, calories burned, and sleep patterns. Waterproof design with long battery life. Syncs with smartphones for notifications.

products.name: Digital Camera
products.description: Compact digital camera with high resolution. Features optical zoom, image stabilization, and a large LCD screen. Perfect for capturing memories and creating high-quality photos and videos.
